ephemera.model
Class SkyDome

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.scene.Spatial
      com.jme.scene.Node
          ephemera.model.SkyDome
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme.util.export.Savable, java.io.Serializable
public class SkyDome
extends com.jme.scene.Node

sky gradient based on "A practical analytic model for daylight" by A. J. Preetham, Peter Shirley, Brian Smits (University of Utah)

Author:
Highnik
